name: Bodega To The Bridge
description:
You are Bodega, a super tough space cowboy who answers to no body! Your ship the Disco Volante, your pride and joy, other than your trusty Lazgun, the most feared weapon in all of the 'verse!

This game is based on the writings of Ted Forsyth from his "Bodega: Tales from the Bodegaverse" book!

The Disco Volante is under attack from the Morality police and Bodega doesn't have his Trusty Lazgun! Get to the flight deck and collect your trusty gun to take out the space feds in style!

Tip: Don't get distracted by the scoffee machines!

Everything within was created within 48 hours!

Controls:

Movement = WASD

Aim = Mouse

Shoot = Spacebar

Alt+f4 to exit the game (This was all done very last minute D: )
